page.title: 04H.M.S. Warrior in Hartlepool
page.content: {5. How is the H.M.S. Warrior powered?} The H.M.S. Warrior is powered by steam and sails. Good strong sails are needed to power it. {6. What was the H.M.S. Warriors {maximum speed?} The maximum speed that she was capable of was 17.5 knots but usually she goes slower. {7. What were the dimensions of H.M.S. {Warrior?} The H.M.S. Warriors length is 4.20 feet overall. The beam is 58 feet 4 inches, the main draft is 26 feet her hull is 10 feet 4 inches. {8. What size was the crew of the {H.M.S. Warrior?} The size of the crew was 707 men. Most of them were young, apart from old veterans. {9. Did it fight in any battles?} Though she didn't fight in any battles she was built because Britain was threatened by Napoleon.
